#summary access to source code

= Get Source =

== ibus-zime ==
{{{
git clone git://github.com/lotem/ibus-zime.git
}}}

== zime-web ==
{{{
svn checkout http://zime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/zine-web
}}}

== Combo Pinyin for Windows ==
{{{
svn checkout http://zime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/zine-win32
}}}

or go to: [http://code.google.com/p/zime/source/checkout Source Checkout Page]
